section-privacy-text-1: Maukonde otsatsa amawona alendo anu ngati malonda. Kwa ife chinthu chokhacho ndicho kudziwa umunthu wawo. Ntchito zathu zimakwaniritsa kapena kupyola GDPR, CCPA, ndi LGPD, komanso njira zothandizira monga Privacy Pass. Timayesetsa kulinganiza zachinsinsi ndi chitetezo.

section-security-text-2: Kugwiritsa ntchito njira zaposachedwa zamakina zophunzirira zinsinsi kumatilola kupitilira miyezo yachitetezo cha mbiri yakale yolemba zonse mosatha popanda kuwononga chitetezo kapena zinsinsi za ogwiritsa ntchito.

Ndife ofikirika komanso omvera, ndipo timawona kukhutira kwa ogwiritsa ntchito ngati KPI yapamwamba.

intro-subtitle-p1-privacy: Njira yapadera yoyendetsedwa ndichinsinsi pachitetezo cha pa intaneti.
info-text-1-pr: hCaptcha Enterprise ili ndi cholinga chimodzi chokha: kuletsa ochita zoyipa kusokoneza ntchito zanu zapaintaneti ndikuvulaza ogwiritsa ntchito anu.
info-text-2-pr: Makina athu amapangidwa kuyambira pansi mpaka pansi kuti achepetse kusonkhanitsa ndi kusungitsa deta kwinaku akusunga chitetezo chotsogola m'gulu. Njira yabwino yotetezera deta ya wosuta sikusunga konse.
info-text-3-pr: Maubale onse a makasitomala amatetezedwanso ndi mgwirizano wamphamvu wa Data Processing Agreement. Ntchito ya hCaptcha imagwirizana ndi malamulo onse achinsinsi mosasamala kanthu komwe ntchito yanu kapena makasitomala anu akukhala. Kusasunga zambiri zanu kumapangitsa izi kukhala zosavuta kwa ife kuposa makampani ena.
info-text-2-2-pr: Ntchito ngati reCAPTCHA v3 zimati kuyika pixel yawo yowunikira patsamba lililonse latsamba lanu ndikofunikira kuti mukhale ndi chitetezo chabwino. Izi sizili choncho.
info-text-2-3-pr: Kusanthula kosavuta kwamakhalidwe ndi chizindikiro chopangidwa mosavuta ndi ochita zoyipa, ndipo kumafuna kusunga mbiri yamayendedwe anu onse ovomerezeka.
info-text-2-4-pr: Sitigwiritsa ntchito zotsatsa, ndipo tilibe chidwi chowonera zomwe mumagwiritsa ntchito kuti muwagulitse malonda. Izi zikutanthauza kuti sitikufuna pixel yokhazikika patsamba lililonse latsamba lanu.
info-text-2-5-pr: Onjezani khodi yathu yotsutsa pokhapokha ngati ikufunika, komanso komwe kuli koyenera kuteteza inuyo ndi ogwiritsa ntchito anu.
info-head-3-pr: Kuphunzira kwa makina ndikothandiza. Koma sikutanthauza deta munthu ntchito.
info-text-3-1-pr: Kuphunzira pamakina tsopano kumakhudza pafupifupi mbali iliyonse ya moyo wathu, nthawi zambiri m'njira zomwe sitikuzindikira komanso zomwe sitingathe kuziwona. Ntchito zachitetezo pa intaneti sizosiyana.
info-text-3-2-pr: Pophunzira masauzande masauzande ambiri, zitsanzo zimatha kupangitsa kuti munthu azikhulupirira kwambiri kuti azitha kuzindikira zinthu zoyipa mwachangu, ngakhale palibe chizindikiro chokhacho chomwe chingakhale champhamvu mokwanira kuwonetsa vuto.
info-text-3-3-pr: Komabe, palibe chilichonse mwa izi chomwe chimafunikira kugwiritsa ntchito chidziwitso chodziwika bwino (PII). Njira zamakono za cryptographic zimatilola kutaya deta iliyonse yaumwini mwamsanga, kupanga m'malo mwake ma signature a njira imodzi omwe sangagwirizane ndi munthu aliyense.
info-text-3-4-pr: Kuphunzitsa pa data yosadziwika kumagwiranso ntchito, ndipo sikufuna kusokoneza chitetezo kapena zinsinsi. Makasitomala athu achita zoyeserera, ndipo adatiuza kuti ndife ofanana kapena abwino kuposa njira zina zachinsinsi.
cloudflare-quote-text-privacy: Tidakonda zinthu zingapo zokhudzana ndi mayankho a hCaptcha: 1) samagulitsa deta yamunthu; amangotenga zidziwitso zosafunika kwenikweni, amalankhula momveka bwino pofotokoza zomwe amasonkhanitsa komanso momwe amazigwiritsira ntchito ndi/kapena kuziulula.
pilot-text-1a: Ndife mainjiniya, osati ogulitsa: tikufuna kuti musangalale ndi zomwe mwasankha.
pilot-text-1b: Njira yabwino yowonetsetsera kukhutitsidwa kwanu ndikuwonetsa kuti timakwaniritsa zosowa zanu.
pilot-text-1c: Pafupifupi makampani onse omwe amayamba oyendetsa ndege amasankha mayankho athu.
pilot-text-1d: Gwiritsani ntchito fomuyi kuti mufikire m'modzi mwa akatswiri athu aukadaulo. Timayankha mwamsanga.
pilot-f5: Mfundo zina ziti zomwe tiyenera kukhala nazo?
pilot-f8: Ndikuwukiridwa ndipo ndikufunika kuti ndikwere mwachangu.
pilot-f10: Polowetsa imelo yanu, mumavomereza Migwirizano ndi Zinsinsi zathu, ndikulandila imelo kuchokera kwa ife.
pilot-fo-2: hCaptcha ili ndi zophatikizira zambiri zomangidwa kale pamakina akutsogolo ndi kumbuyo komwe mumagwiritsa ntchito.
pilot-fo-3: Ngati mukuchokera ku reCAPTCHA ya Google, ma API athu ndi olowa m'malo. Mizere itatu yamakhodi ndi zonse zomwe mukufuna.
pilot-fo-4: Akatswiri athu opanga ma boarding atha kukupangitsani kupita mwachangu, kaya mukufuna kuphatikiza React, ma SDK a mapulogalamu amtundu wa iOS, chitsanzo chakumbuyo kwa Java, kapena zochitika zina zilizonse.
pilot-fo-5: Ndipo monga nthawi zonse, zachinsinsi ndizofunikira kwambiri kwa ife. Onjezani khodi yathu yotsutsa pokhapokha ngati ikufunika, komanso komwe kuli koyenera kuteteza inuyo ndi ogwiritsa ntchito anu. Kuchepetsa kusonkhanitsa deta kumayambira panthawi yophatikiza.

about-advisors-brendan: Mtsogoleri wamkulu wa Brave. Co-woyambitsa wa Mozilla. Wopanga chinenero chamapulogalamu a JavaScript. Omanga asakatuli ndi zina zambiri.
about-advisors-dawn: Pulofesa, CS ku University of California, Berkeley. Kuphunzira mwakuya, chitetezo, katswiri wa blockchain. Mtsogoleri wamkulu wa Oasis Labs.
about-advisors-keiran: Kafukufuku Wasayansi ku Stanford. Kuphunzira makina ndi ndalama zochulukirapo m'mabanki akulu, ma hedge funds, ndi maphunziro.
about-content-text-1a: hCaptcha imabweretsa njira zamakono, zachinsinsi zoletsa bots.
about-content-text-1b: Tikuwonetsa zovuta za CAPTCHA zomwe ndizovuta kwa bots koma zosavuta kwa anthu posonkhanitsa zovuta kuzisanja pamavuto ophunzirira makina, ndikuzigwiritsa ntchito kusiyanitsa ngati tsamba lawebusayiti kapena woyendera mapulogalamu ndi munthu.
about-content-text-2a: Ochita zoyipa akuchulukirachulukira pa intaneti. Koma kupereka chinsinsi kwa ogwiritsa ntchito siyankho.
about-content-text-2b: Mayankho achitetezo operekedwa ndi makampani otsatsa amayang'ana kwambiri pakutsata ogwiritsa ntchito pa intaneti. Takhazikitsa njira yothetsera chitetezo yomwe imatsimikizira kuti kuwononga chinsinsi kwa ogwiritsa ntchito sikofunikira kupereka zotsatira zabwino.
about-intro-text: hCaptcha ndiye ntchito yodziyimira payokha yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri padziko lonse lapansi ya CAPTCHA.
about-leadership-headsub: Gulu lodziwa zambiri, logwira ntchito pamavuto ovuta masiku ano.
about-leadership-text1: Timagwiritsa ntchito makina ophunzirira mwakuya komanso makina opangira makina, makamaka tikufuna kupeza njira zapaintaneti zoopseza zamakono.
about-leadership-text2: Ndi zaka makumi ambiri zaukadaulo wamapulogalamu ndi makina, timamanga ndikugwiritsa ntchito makina owopsa othetsera mavuto ena amakono ndikusunga chinsinsi.

home-about-text-1: hCaptcha yapangidwa kuti ithetse vuto lalikulu kwambiri pantchito yophunzira pamakina: kulemba kuchuluka kwakanthawi munthawi yake, yotsika mtengo, komanso yodalirika.
home-about-text-2: Zambiri zambiri zimabweretsa zotsatira zabwino pakuphunzitsira makina ophunzirira. Kupambana kwaposachedwa kwamamitengo akuya kwapangitsa kuti pakhale madeti akuluakulu, pafupifupi nthawi zonse ndikuwunikiridwa ndi anthu. Komabe, kupanga madaseti akulu owunikiridwa ndi anthu kudzera pa Mechanical Turk, Chithunzi Chachisanu ndi chitatu, ndi zina zonse ndizochedwa komanso zotsika mtengo.
home-about-text-3: hCaptcha imalola masamba awebusayiti kuti azipeza ndalama pothandizira izi ndikuletsa bots ndi mitundu ina yazunzo.
home-about-text-4: Msika wa hCaptcha umayendetsedwa ndi HUMAN Protocol, njira yotseguka yoyeserera kuti anthu awunikenso yomwe ikuyenda pa Ethereum blockchain. Mawebusayiti amalandira Zikwangwani Zaumunthu (HMT) nthawi iliyonse yomwe ogwiritsa ntchito amagwiritsa ntchito chida cha hCaptcha patsamba lawo, ndipo makampani ophunzirira makina amalipira Chizindikiro cha Anthu kuti adziwe zolemba zawo.
home-benefits-text-1: Kodi mumazindikira nthawi iliyonse mukadina pagalimoto yomwe mukuthandizira kuphunzitsa makina amodzi a kampani ya Gigantic kwaulere?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha amatembenuza mtunduwu mozungulira. Mukamagwiritsa ntchito hCaptcha, makampani amalipira pantchito yomwe ogwiritsa ntchito anu amachita poonetsa umunthu wawo. Mumalandira mphotho.
home-benefits-text-3: Mukufuna kubwezera ku zachifundo zomwe mumakonda? hCaptcha imakuthandizani kuti muthandizire othandizira omwe mungasankhe ndi zomwe mumapeza mukamagwiritsa ntchito. Ogwiritsa ntchito tsamba lanu posachedwa awona zopereka zanu zachifundo kudzera pakulemba mwachinsinsi pa mawonekedwe a hCaptcha.

home-intro-body: Kodi mumagwiritsa ntchito captcha kuteteza bots? hCaptcha imateteza zinsinsi za ogwiritsa ntchito, imapatsa mphotho mawebusayiti, komanso imathandizira makampani kuti azilemba zomwe adalemba. Ndikulowetsa m'malo kwa reCAPTCHA: mutha kusintha mphindi zochepa.
home-intro-head: Imani bots ambiri. Yambani kuteteza zinsinsi za ogwiritsa ntchito.
home-main-1: Zachinsinsi. Otetezeka. Mofulumirirako. Ndipo timakulipirani kuti mugwiritse ntchito.
home-main-2c: Maukonde otsatsa amawona alendo anu ngati malonda. Kwa hCaptcha mankhwala ndi ntchito yomwe amapereka. Sitisamala kuti ogwiritsa ntchito anu ndi ndani, koma atha kukhala oyipa. Timathandizira zoyeserera monga Privacy Pass, ndipo timagwira ntchito molimbika kuti tisamalire zachinsinsi komanso chitetezo.
home-main-3c: Zowona zili mu chidwi chanu komanso chathu. hCaptcha ndiyofalitsa. Timagwira ntchito kuti tikupatseni zenizeni komanso kuti musankhe momwe mungazigwiritsire ntchito. Ma Captchas ena amaperekedwa ndi makampani otsatsa a Gigantic. Izi zikutanthauza kuti bot zonse zomwe amaletsa zimatha kuchepetsa ndalama zomwe amapeza.
home-main-4c: Mitundu yapamwamba yophunzirira makina imagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi hCaptcha pozindikira umunthu. Izi zimatipangitsa kuti tizigwira ntchito zosakhumudwitsa kuchokera kwa ogwiritsa ntchito ndikuwatenga nthawi yocheperako pochita izi, tikadali ndi data yolemba makasitomala.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha ndi yaulere kugwiritsa ntchito ofalitsa amtundu uliwonse. Komabe, kwa mabizinesi ndi nsanja zomwe zimafunikira kuwongolera, mayankho athu mabizinesi alipo.

labeling-ent-text-2: Kuthamangitsani kwathunthu kuntchito ndi anthu omwe mumagwira nawo ntchito, kuchuluka kwa ndalama zomwe mumagwiritsa ntchito m'mabizinesi kapena omwe mumagwirizana nawo, kusankha njira zantchito zopezera anthu ogwira ntchito mkati kapena akunja kutengera mtengo ndi chitetezo, ndi zina zambiri.

labeling-ent-text-4: 99.99% SLAs uptime ndi 24/7 thandizo lapadziko lonse lapansi zilipo. Kuti mudziwe zambiri:
labeling-features-head-2: Zokometsedwa pamtengo komanso zabwino. Palibe kudzipereka koyambirira kofunikira.

labeling-features-text-1: Mukufuna kuphatikiza kuwunikanso kwa anthu mwachindunji muzamalonda anu? Timapereka ma SLA odalirika, mphamvu yotsimikizika, ndi ma REST APIs osavuta.
labeling-features-text-2: Pulatifomu ya ANTHU imagwiritsa ntchito mitundu yonse yazikhulupiriro kuti ichite zowunikira zenizeni zenizeni. Izi zimatithandiza kuzindikira msanga kuvuta kwamafunso komanso mayankho ake olondola, kukupulumutsirani nthawi ndi ndalama.
labeling-features-text-3: Si mavuto onse ofanana. Zofotokozera za ntchito zofunikira pachitetezo zingafune chidaliro cha 99.99% kuchokera kwa ogwira ntchito anthu onse. Zofotokozera za gawo limodzi la beta mu pulogalamu yamasewera am'manja zimangofunika kudzidalira pang'ono. Mumasankha.
labeling-features-text-4: Kodi muli ndi zosaphika popanda kutsimikizira kwathunthu? Nthawi zambiri titha kukupangirani imodzi ngati ntchito zomwe zikuchitika, kapena kupanga zitsanzo zolembedwa kuti muvomereze.
labeling-info-text-1: Lankhulani ndi m'modzi mwa akatswiri athu kuti afotokozere zosowa za projekiti yanu: kulondola kwa chandamale, mtundu, ndi zofunikira zilizonse.
labeling-info-text-2: Timachita ntchito yaying'ono yopanga kutengera zomwe mwasankha. Izi zimayesa ntchito yomwe tachita limodzi kuti tiwonetsetse zomwe mukufuna.
labeling-info-text-3: Ndi voliyumu yathu komanso kutsika kotsika tidzatembenuza ntchito yanu mwachangu, ndikupereka mwachangu ikangomaliza.
labeling-info-text-4: Tikamvetsetsa bwino magawo azomwe mukupanga, zotsatira zake zidzapitabe patsogolo pakapita nthawi.
labeling-info-text-5: Ma dashboard amoyo amakulolani kuti mupereke mayankho kapena kuyimitsa kaye nthawi iliyonse.
labeling-main-1: Kulemba deta kotsika mtengo pamlingo wokulirapo
labeling-main-1c: Mukufuna zilembo zambiri zamagulu anu a data? hCaptcha imapereka zilembo zachangu, zotsika mtengo, komanso zapamwamba zamakampani omwe amagwira ntchito zanzeru zopanga komanso kugwiritsa ntchito makina ophunzirira.
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha ili ndi imodzi mwamaiwe akulu kwambiri padziko lapansi omwe mungagwiritse ntchito. Mulimonse momwe mungakhalire, titha kuthana nawo popanda kudzipereka kokwera mtengo. Ntchito mamiliyoni patsiku silovuta.

Tekinoloje iyi imalola ogwira ntchito oyenera kuti azigwira gawo lililonse la ntchito yanu, kukulitsa mtengo wogwira posunga chinsinsi ndikukwaniritsa zofunikira zilizonse zomwe zingagwire ntchito.
labeling-try-text: ... ndife okonzeka mukakhala: ntchito yathu imapezeka usana ndi usiku.
page-acc-faq-1: Funso: Kodi hCaptcha Gawo 508 + WCAG 2.1 AA ikugwirizana? Yankho: Timakhulupirira kuti: ogwiritsa ntchito onse omwe ali ndi vuto lililonse omwe amatha kuyang'ana pa intaneti ndikulowetsa malemba pa mafomu angapeze mautumiki otetezedwa ndi hCaptcha polembetsa. Komabe, uwu si upangiri wazamalamulo: muyenera kudziyesa nokha, poganizira momwe mungagwiritsire ntchito kuti muwonetsetse kuti ndi momwe mukutumizidwira.
page-acc-faq-2: Funso: Kodi mukugwira ntchito zina zopezeka (a11y), monga zomvera? Yankho: Zosankha zomwe zidadziwika kale monga ma audio captcha zimasankha ogwiritsa ntchito ambiri a11y ndipo zimagonjetsedwa mosavuta ndi njira zamakono zophunzirira makina. Izi zakakamiza zovuta zamawu kuti zikhale zovuta kwambiri, kubweretsa phokoso, nthawi yosamvetseka, kuphatikiza mawu osazolowereka, ndi zina zotero kuti agonjetse omwe akuwukira. Sitikhala okondwa kwambiri ndi njira iyi motsutsana ndi kupewa zovuta zonse, koma tilingalira ngati pali zofunidwa kuchokera ku gulu la a11y. Komabe, tili ndi chidwi kwambiri ndi Privacy Pass for the Accessibility use case. Tikukhulupirira kuti kuphatikiza njira yathu yamakono ya a11y ndi kutulutsidwa kwa Privacy Pass kudzalola ogwiritsa ntchito a11y kuti asakatule mosatekeseka, otetezeka podziwa kuti magalimoto awo ndi achinsinsi, pomwe akuletsa kuzunzidwa ndi ogwiritsa ntchito bot zomwe zimachitika mosapeweka zosankha za a11y zilipo. Ndife otenga nawo mbali mu gulu la IETF lomwe likuyimira ukadaulo watsopanowu.
page-acc-faq-3: Funso: Nanga bwanji zachinsinsi? Kodi kulembetsa kumavumbula zidziwitso zakusaka kwa a11y mwanjira ina? Mumatani ndi imeloyo? Yankho: hCaptcha idapangidwa kuti ikhale yachinsinsi kuyambira pansi. Ndizosiyana kwambiri ndi zosankha zanthawi zonse monga reCAPTCHA yomwe ili ndi maukonde otsatsa, omwe ali ndi chilimbikitso kuti azitha kukutsatirani pa intaneti ndikukuyanjanitsani ndi zomwe mukudziwa. Sitigwiritsa ntchito maimelo opezeka kapena zidziwitso pazifukwa zilizonse kupatula kuthandizira kugwiritsa ntchito a11y ndikupewa nkhanza. Mfundo zathu zachinsinsi zili ndi mayankho omveka bwino komanso ovomerezeka amomwe timagwiritsira ntchito deta, koma yankho lalifupi ndiloti tilibe chidwi chokuyanjanitsani monga munthu ndi mbiri yanu yosakatula. Panopa tikugwiranso ntchito njira yopezera imelo kuti tisiye mwachangu imelo yanu. tikusungabe kuthekera kwathu kopewera nkhanza, ndikukwaniritsa ntchito yathu ya Privacy Pass.
page-acc-link-1: Ngati mukugwiritsa ntchito, chonde lembani pano.
page-acc-subhead: Kuonetsetsa kuti ogwiritsa ntchito onse akusungidwa mosasamala
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha idapangidwa kuti iziyimitsa bots powasiyanitsa ndi anthu. Mayesero owoneka ndi chida chothandiza pa izi, koma si onse omwe angathe kuthetsa vuto lowonekera. Pazifukwa izi tapanga njira yosavuta, yosapweteka yolola osindikiza omwe amagwiritsa ntchito ntchito yathu kuti asunge kupezeka kwa onse motsatira Gawo 508 ndi WCAG 2.1 AA.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Momwe imagwirira ntchito: choyamba, wogwiritsa ntchito osayina akulemba pa URL iyi, yomwe imalumikizidwa patsamba la hCaptcha widget info. Amapatsidwa keke yotsekedwa yomwe imatha kugwiritsidwa ntchito kangapo patsiku, koma iyenera kutsitsimutsidwa maola 24 aliwonse olowera.
page-acc-tr-body:
Funso: Ndikuwonabe zovuta nditakhazikitsa cookie. Nchiyani chikuyambitsa izi?
Yankho: Izi zimachitika makamaka chifukwa chogwiritsa ntchito zotsatsira zotsutsa kapena zosakanikirana ndi ma cookie, kapena malo omwe amalepheretsa ma cookie, pomwepa cookie ya hcaptcha.com yomwe idayikidwa kapena kuyang'aniridwa ndi hCaptcha JS patsamba lina , ngati amene mumamuyendera.

Ma cookies a hCaptcha amagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi asakatuli onse odziwika bwino komanso otsatsa zotsatsa ndi makonda awo, chifukwa chake kulephera kumachitika chifukwa chotsutsana ndi anti-adblock zolemba kapena malamulo omwe amatsata masamba ena.

Zothetsera:

1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com ndi * .hcaptcha.com makeke muzotsatsira zotsatsa kapena osatsegula pazotsegula.
2. Ngati mukugwiritsa ntchito msakatuli Wolimba Mtima, yemwe pano sakuwoneka kuti ali ndi mtundu uliwonse wazovomerezeka, pitani ku Zokonda -> Shields -> Cookies ndikusankha Lolani Ma Cookies Onse.
3. Ngati mukugwiritsa ntchito mtundu waposachedwa kwambiri wa Safari pa OS X 10.15 kapena iOS 13.4 yomwe yangotulutsidwa kumene, Apple yasintha machitidwe a Safari okhudzana ndi ma cookie wachitatu, kuwaletsa onse mwachisawawa. Tikukhazikitsa yankho, koma pakadali pano chonde pitani Zosankha za Safari, gawo lazachinsinsi, ndikusanthula kutsata kutsamba lawebusayiti: Pewani kutsata masamba a masamba omwe akupezeka kuti agwire ntchito monga momwe amayembekezera.

Funso: Ndimagwiritsa ntchito zida zingapo. Kodi ndiyenera kulembetsa kangapo?
Yankho: Ayi. Chonde dinani imelo yolumikizira imelo yomwe imatumizidwa kwa inu pachida chilichonse chomwe mumagwiritsa ntchito poyika cookie.

Funso: Ndingadziteteze bwanji kuti ndisawone kumene ma cookie akampani yachitatu ndikugwiritsa ntchito keke yopezeka?
Yankho: Kugwiritsa ntchito chinsinsi chilichonse kapena chotseka chotsatsa chomwe chimathandizira kuyimitsa pamizere (mwachitsanzo Block Origin) chidzagwira ntchito monga zikuyembekezeredwa: onetsetsani kuti mukufuna whitelist hcaptcha.com.
page-acc-tr-title: Kwa Ogwiritsa Ntchito: Mafunso Okhazikika ndi Maupangiri Othetsa Mavuto
page-acc-tr2-body:
Safari
Kuti mulowetse ma cookie ku Safari (Mac): Pitani ku menyu yotsitsa ya Safari. Sankhani Zokonda. Dinani Zachinsinsi pamwambapa. Pansi pa 'Block cookies' sankhani njira 'Osatero.'
Kuti ma cookies mu Safari (iPhone / iPad iOS 11+) athe: Tsegulani Zikhazikiko. Mpukutu pansi ndi kusankha Safari. Pazinsinsi & Chitetezo, chotsani 'Prevent Cross-Site Tracking' ndi 'Block All Cookies'

Firefox
Dinani pa chishango kumanzere kwa bar ya adilesi patsamba lililonse. Dinani pa Zida Zachitetezo. Gulu lazosankha mwachinsinsi & Chitetezo cha Firefox litsegulidwa. Pansi pa Chitetezo Chotsata Chotsatira, sankhani Mwambo. Sankhani ma trackers ndi zolembera zomwe mungatseke posankha mabokosiwo. Onetsetsani kuti mwatsegula hcaptcha.com.

Muthanso kuzimitsa kwakanthawi mu Custom kuti muchotse izi, posankha mabokosi oyang'anira: Sankhani mabokosi oyang'anira ma Trackers kapena musankhe bokosi la ma Cookies ngati mudakali ndi zovuta.

Google Chrome
Google Chrome (PC)
Sankhani chizindikiro cha menyu ya Chrome. Sankhani Zikhazikiko.
Pitani ku Zachinsinsi ndi Chitetezo, kenako ma Cookies ndi zina zambiri patsamba.
Onetsetsani kuti 'Block cookies-third-party cookies' satha.

Google Chrome (Mac):
Tsegulani zokonda za Chrome kuchokera pa bar ya menyu.
Pitani ku Zachinsinsi ndi Chitetezo, kenako ma Cookies ndi zina zambiri patsamba.
Onetsetsani kuti 'Block cookies-third-party cookies' satha.

Google Chrome (Android):
Pa chipangizo chanu cha Android, tsegulani pulogalamu ya Chrome.
Kumanja kumanja, dinani Zambiri kenako Zikhazikiko.
Dinani Zikhazikiko za Tsamba kenako ma Cookies.
Pafupi ndi 'Cookies,' sinthani zoikamo.
Fufuzani bokosi pafupi ndi 'Lolani ma cookies ena.'

Internet Explorer
1. Sankhani zida pamakona akumanja chakumanja pazenera, kenako sankhani 'Internet Options'. Ngati muli ndi Menyu Yoyenera, mutha kusankha 'Zida' kenako 'Zosankha pa intaneti'.
2. Dinani tabu ya 'Zachinsinsi'.
3. Sankhani batani la 'Advanced'.
4. Pansi pa 'Cookies lachitatu' sankhani 'Landirani'.
5. Dinani 'Chabwino'
page-acc-tr2-head: Malangizo a Msakatuli wa Ma Cookies Apakati pa Malo
priv-hc-text: Ma netiweki otsatsa malonda amakuwonani ngati malonda awo. Sititero. Sitikusamala kuti ogwiritsa ntchito ndi ndani, kungoti angakhale oyipa bwanji. Timathandizira zoyeserera monga Pass Pass, ndikugwira ntchito molimbika kuti tipeze chinsinsi komanso chitetezo.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Kodi muli ndi vuto lakuwona kapena simukutha kumaliza hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-head: Kujambula Zambiri za Lipoti la Bug: Firefox
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Gawo 1: Tsegulani Zida Zotsatsira (Izi zimayamba kujambula gawoli.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Gawo 2: Dinani pa Network tabu mu Zida Zosintha. Fufuzani bokosi la Persist pamwamba.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Gawo 3: pitani ku https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kapena tsamba lomwe muli ndi vuto (Zidziwitso Zazinsinsi: pokhapokha ngati mulibe nazo vuto kugawana zomwe zili) ... kenako dinani I ndine munthu batani, ndikuyesera kuthetsa.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Khwerero 4: Dinani HAR mutayesa kuthetsa, ndikusankha Sungani Zonse monga HAR kuti musunge chipika cha netiweki. Titumizireni fayiloyo.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Gawo 5: Dinani pa tsamba la Console, ndikudina kumanja kenako Sankhani zonse ndikuzisunga mu fayilo, kuti muzisunga log log. Titumizireni ifenso.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Gawo lomaliza: Titumizireni maimelo a HAR ndi ma fayilo a chipika, ndipo fotokozani vutoli Gwiritsani ntchito: support@hcaptcha.com (chonde gwiritsani ntchito ntchito ngati Dropbox kapena Filebin ndikutumiza maulalo) ndikusankha chithunzithunzi, ngati mukukayikira kuti pali china chake chomwe sichikuwonetsa bwino. . Chonde tumizaninso IP yomwe mukugwiritsa ntchito. Mutha kuzipeza kuchokera ku https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Zikomo potenga nthawi kuti mutithandize kudziwa izi! Tadzipereka kupanga hCaptcha kuti igwire ntchito bwino kwa aliyense.
reporting-bugs-guide-head: Kujambula Zambiri za Lipoti la Bug: Chrome
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: Gawo 1: Tsegulani Zida Zotsatsira (Izi zimayamba kujambula gawoli.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: Gawo 2: Dinani pa Network tabu mu Zida Zosintha. Chongani Sungani bokosi lamatabwa pamwamba.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Khwerero 3: pitani ku https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, kapena tsamba lomwe muli ndi vuto (Zidziwitso Zazinsinsi: pokhapokha ngati mulibe nazo vuto kugawana zomwe zili) ... kenako dinani I ndine munthu batani, ndikuyesera kuthetsa.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Gawo 4: Dinani Tumizani HAR (muvi wotsika pang'ono) mukayesa kuthetsa, zomwe zimasunga chipika cha netiweki. Tumizani fayilo ija kwa ife.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: Gawo 5: Dinani pa tsamba la Console, ndikudina pompano kenako Sungani ngati .. kuti musunge cholembera cha console. Titumizireni ifenso.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Khwerero lomaliza: Titumizireni imelo mafayilo a HAR ndi zolembera za console, ndikufotokozera vutolo. Gwiritsani ntchito: support@hcaptcha.com (chonde gwiritsani ntchito ntchito ngati Dropbox kapena Filebin ndikutumiza maulalo) ndikusankha chithunzithunzi, ngati mukukayikira kuti pali china chake chomwe sichikuwoneka bwino. Chonde tumizaninso IP yomwe mukugwiritsa ntchito. Mutha kuzipeza kuchokera ku https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Zikomo potenga nthawi kuti mutithandize kudziwa izi! Tadzipereka kupanga hCaptcha kuti igwire ntchito bwino kwa aliyense.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Kutumiza uthenga pokhudzana ndi vuto lanu ndi lipoti lanu kungakhale kosavuta kwa ife kuzindikira zomwe zikuchitika. Nawo malangizo mwatsatanetsatane:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Ngati ndinu okonza ukonde kapena katswiri wogwiritsa ntchito, chidule chake ndikuti tikufuna kuti mutitumizire makanema ojambula pa intaneti HAR ndi zolemba za msakatuli. Chonde yesani kuletsa chotchinga chilichonse kapena zowonjezera zachitetezo cha msakatuli kaye kenako yesaninso musanadutse izi. Izi zikathetsa vuto lanu, tingayamikirebe kutidziwitsa mtundu wa msakatuli wanu, block blocker kapena msakatuli wowonjezera, ndi ulalo watsamba lawebusayiti.
reporting-bugs-intro-head: Mudapeza kachilombo? Umu ndi momwe munganene.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Mamiliyoni a anthu amagwiritsa ntchito hCaptcha mwezi uliwonse, pamasakatuli masauzande ambiri, zowonjezera, zida, zotchingira moto, ndi zina zambiri. Cholinga chathu ndikuwonetsetsa kuti zikugwirirani ntchito nthawi zonse, chifukwa chake timayamikira kwambiri malipoti anu! Kuti mupereke ndemanga mwachangu, ingodinani batani la Tumizani Mauthenga. Ngati mukuwona vuto logwira ntchito, chonde tsatirani malangizo olakwika a Chrome kapena malangizo olakwika a Firefox pansipa. Kwa asakatuli ena aliwonse angotitumizira imelo. Pazinthu zachitetezo kapena zachinsinsi, onani malangizo pansipa.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Sitikusamala kuti ogwiritsa ntchito ndi ndani, kungoti akhoza kukhala oyipa kapena makina. Timathandizira zoyeserera monga Pass Pass, ndikugwira ntchito molimbika kuti tipeze chinsinsi komanso chitetezo. Ngati mwapeza vuto lomwe mukuganiza kuti lingakhudze chinsinsi cha ogwiritsa ntchito, chonde titumizireni imelo ku support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Tikuyamikira zomwe mwapereka. Tiuzeni zovuta zilizonse ndipo tizithetsa mwachangu.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Nthawi zonse timakhala okonzeka kulandira malipoti a nkhwangwa zachitetezo. Imelo support@hcaptcha.com & CC security@hcaptcha.com ndipo tibwerera kwa inu mwachangu. Tilinso ndi pulogalamu yochulukitsa yolandila malipoti pazachitetezo cha hCaptcha ndi chinsinsi china chokhudzana nacho.
sales-interstitial-c2b: Onjezani hCaptcha ya Ofalitsa patsamba langa kapena pulogalamu yanga
sales-interstitial-head: Tiyeni tiwonetsetse kuti mwafika pamalo oyenera.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha imayang'ana kwambiri kwa osindikiza. Timayesetsa kupatsa masamba data yeniyeni ndikuwalola kuti asankhe momwe angagwiritsire ntchito. Kulondola ndi chidwi chanu komanso chathu. Ma captchas ena amaperekedwa ndi makampani otsatsa. Bot iliyonse yomwe amaletsa ikhoza kuchepetsa ndalama zawo.
signup-interstitial-c1b: Onjezani hCaptcha ya Ofalitsa patsamba langa kapena pulogalamu yanga
signup-interstitial-head: Tiyeni tiwonetsetse kuti mwafika pamalo oyenera.
support-interstitial-c1d: Pezani chithandizo cha wofalitsa wa hCaptcha
support-interstitial-head: Tiyeni tiwonetsetse kuti mwafika pamalo oyenera.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: hCaptcha imathandizira mautumiki omwe mumawakonda kuti asunge bots, sipamu, ndi nkhanza pofunsa mafunso osavuta osavuta kwa anthu komanso ovuta pamakina.
why-hc-text: Nthawi iliyonse mukayankha zovuta, timagwiritsa ntchito mitundu yotsogola kuti tidziwe ngati ndinu anthu kapena makina. Tsamba lomwe mudapitako kenako limagwiritsa ntchito zotsatirazi kuti zikuthandizireni bwino zomwe zili patsamba lawo posunga bots.
